job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van schaalbare en krachtige (AI) applicaties met behulp van het Flutterflow, n8n, Firebase en Supabase
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development of applications, indicating software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met ons team van ongeveer 15 collega's aan end-to-end AI-applicatieontwikkeling
job_tasks.justification: Describes the collaborative development of AI applications, fitting under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Incidenteel gebruik van Javascript, Python en Dart voor datatransformatie en het bouwen van custom functies
job_tasks.justification: Mentions 'datatransformatie' and building custom functions using programming languages, which falls under data engineering and development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Vertalen van complexe AI-concepten naar praktische toepassingen voor onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the need to understand business needs and translate technical concepts into client-facing solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van onze Software Development As A Service methode
job_tasks.justification: Improving a 'Software Development As A Service' method suggests a focus on operational processes and continuous improvement of development workflows.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met ons team van ongeveer 15 collega's
Vertalen van complexe AI-concepten naar praktische toepassingen voor onze klanten
Bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van onze Software Development As A Service methode

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing AI applications and translating complex AI concepts into practical client solutions. While it includes software development tasks and data transformation, the core focus on building AI applications with specific tools like Flutterflow and n8n, alongside the need to translate AI concepts, aligns strongly with the responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
